website_summaries.verdict: A lithium-ion battery gives pet owners a vacuum with the powerful charge and long life they need to pick up pet hair.
pros: Cordless hand vac with long-lasting lithium-ion battery
Detachable motorized pet brush removes pet hair and ground-in dirt
Includes crevice tool, charging adapter, and dust cup filter
Picks up cat hair and litter
cons: No charging stand or wall caddy

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time last night and I love it. I have two dogs and a cat and foster dogs so dog hair is something I have no shortage of. I have an all white couch which is typically covered/protected and has the cushions removed every couple weeks to bleach. One cleaning with this and it looks like the couch was bleached. Plus it gets all the hard to reach places that aren't cleaned. I have tried the vacuum attachments, the roll over things, this was easier and worked far better. So far I am in love!!
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies quick
customer_reviews.text: Suction is decent but the charge only last 15 min max.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Full Size Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! Great battery life, I have only a couple area rugs and stairs for carpet in my home so it is silly to pull out my big full size vacuum. This is perfect and gets into all the crevices that my full size cannot. I mean it will if I pull out the vacuum with the attachments and plug them into the vacuum then find an outlet that will reach , but why do all that when I can grab this with no cords and vacuum in 3 minutes. Try it, you’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: Treuly33

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Picks up a lot of pet hair and carpet fibers . Holds a charge well.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia LaBruna

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: !. Does not have very good suction 2. When used with pet brush charge last 10-15 minutes 3. Very difficult & messy to clean 4. After the first cleaning there was even less suction. Bag appears to restrict air flow. 5 My wife hates it!
customer_reviews.author: Duane D.

customer_reviews.title: What I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small bedroom with carpet flooring, and long hair that loosens itself daily... So this little fella does the wonderful job of picking it up! The brush roller is my life safer, I don't have to use a roller to pick up my hair anymore. I use a seam ripper to clean the brush, and use an air duster can to clean the inside of the vacuum and its filter. The battery surely lasts for 3 or so times before I have to charge it again. And I do all the small room. I'm so glad for this compact vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Use in my semi, charges with a small 300 wt enverter just fine. Plenty of power and the brush works great on my dogs hair. Big truck full carpet and I get at least twice before dies, about 20 min. Great vacuum! !
customer_reviews.author: keith burris

customer_reviews.title: Not much power
customer_reviews.text: This does not have much suction at all; want to send it back. Also doesn't hold a charge that long.
customer_reviews.author: marcia tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Much improved
customer_reviews.text: The lithium battery is a marked improvement! We had the older model, which was a good vacuum and worked very well except when its NiCad battery quit, which is the reason we stayed with the Shark. So far, we like this model's abilities just as well, and the charge lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Walters

customer_reviews.title: This stopped working on the third time
customer_reviews.text: I literally used it twice for 15 minutes on our sectional, then the brush stopped rotating the third time I went to use it. I can't see any hair or anything stuck in the brush, but because it doesn't come apart I can't even try to fix it. It is completely unusable. I hesitated about buying this, and I regret wasting my money on this. Very very disappointed, as my Shark Navigator upright vac is great.
customer_reviews.author: jujumucc

customer_reviews.title: A Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Does an amazing job on our couch/the world's most expensive dog bed.
customer_reviews.author: West Seality

customer_reviews.title: sprays vacuumed contents out the side vents
customer_reviews.text: When using the unit its great at picking up the debris, however it sprays what is picked up out the exhaust vents on the side of the unit. Make a bigger mess. I went to return it and the company charges $20.00 for shipping. I paid for the shipping once and well as full price for the unit. I get to pay more than standard shipping costs again just because I bought something that does not work correctly. Not Happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dog family: game changer. How did I not know this existed?
customer_reviews.author: Ben Pershouse

customer_reviews.title: SHARK IS THE DADDY OF ALL🌟
customer_reviews.text: Always have had a shark! (Dust busters stink) SO I DECIDED TO GV THE OLDER BLUE A WELL NEEDED REST - STILL WORKS GREAT HOWEVER SINCE THE NEW ONE CAME OMG 😮 SO MUCH MORE POWER AND I AM GLAD I BOUGHT A NEWER VERSION! FANTASTICO!!!! Always go w SHARK YOU WILL BE SOOOO GLAD YOU DID! Even their CUSTOMER SERVICE IS EXCELLENT- Incase u want to buy an extra tool ex: edger/pet attachment ( WHICH WORKS SUBPERB) or hv a question... .. I’m older and hv had/bought all different brands and WD NEVER BUY ANYTHING BUT A SHARK! Light weight vaccunm is GREAT TOO ! FOR PEOPLE LIKE ME WHO CANT LIFT.....THIS VAC IS ANOTHER SHARK WINNER 🎉
customer_reviews.author: deeroz

customer_reviews.title: Not so special
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more because of the reviews. It picks up dog hair from like 3 steps then it has to be emptied. I also find the attachments a little difficult to get on and off. Same when emptying. I shouldn’t have to wrestle with it. I was looking for a portable vacuum for my steps. This is not he answer.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Falana

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very happy with it. The corn-based litter we use gets into a panel on the side of the inside and stays there. Can't be shaken out. The litter we use with kittens is paper-based, and even though it's very lightweight, I guess the pieces are too big because the vacuum just doesn't pick them up. The one good thing is that the battery lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: ipinkykittykat

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Pushes litter around and extremly hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: The (LV801) has so many design short comings. 1. The internal silicon flap does not close so the litter falls right back out. You just push small granules around. 2. See pictures. Due to the internal ridges it is impossible clean the inside. The gunk just keeps building up. 3. Due to the power head brush electrical connectors. You cannot immerse the shown in water to clean. We have tried most all cordless vacs. They ALL have the same basic issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Short battery life, but works great!
customer_reviews.text: The charge life on this vacuum is pretty short, but other than that it's great! I love the motorized attachment for getting dog hair off of my stairs. The battery lasts just long enough for me to vacuum the stairs (15 steps). I am very thorough, but that still is only a handful of minutes. Works for my purposes, though!
customer_reviews.author: HCM

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum works best at full charge
customer_reviews.text: Use up the battery then fully charge it. This vacuum works best at full charge. It is amazing at sucking up fur and hair.
customer_reviews.author: Shallon Bawden

customer_reviews.title: Works great on upholstery!
customer_reviews.text: Very handy if you have pets. Works well for small messes and furniture. It beats having to drag out the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Huschke

customer_reviews.title: it stopped working within a month
customer_reviews.text: On the third use I heard this whining noise and I noticed the brush stopped rotating. I tried cleaning out the brush but that made no difference. It still won't work. This should not have died after just a couple of uses. Even before the brush issue I thought the suction was rather mediocre. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fazwa

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: There were both good and bad reviews of this product, but I decided to take my chances, even though I'm not a fan of Shark (they always disappoint), and let me tell you, this is HORRIBLE. There's no suction. At all. It's a waste of money. I kept forgetting to print out the return slip, and now it's too late, so I'm stuck with this $60 hunk of junk. My $25 Dirt Devil from PC Richard & Son is much better. This one can't even get up crumbs, much less pet hair. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’m always looking for a good hand held cleaner because we have pets and to do quick clean ups. This had good suction, a decent sized cup that’s easy to remove, but it’s down hill from there. The in cup filter is a nightmare to clean. The roller traps hair like a magnet or hair brush. It works. It had a good battery life on a charge. I’ll keep it as long as the rechargeable battery lasts and grumble every time I clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary59

customer_reviews.title: Good machine, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I really like this machine, easy to use and clean and does have strong vacuum action for a handheld. After less than two months of using this 3-4 times a week for dust pick up in a small house, the charging adapter’s pin broke off remaining in the vacuum - i pulled it out and tried to put it back but was unsuccessful. Called the company and they immediately said they would send a new adapter (no fee) and said it should arrive within a week. One thing that would be nice: a rubber edge on the nozzle attachment , the hard plastic leaves light scratches on my hardwood floors, unless I am careful to keep it above the surface.
customer_reviews.author: cevee

customer_reviews.title: Works for quickly cleaning fur off sofa
customer_reviews.text: I use this unit to pick up the fur my dog leaves on the sofa. It works pretty well at that. The battery life is so-so. I can clean several times before it needs recharging, about what I expected on a compact unit. It picks up the loose fur well. I'm not so impressed with cleaning it. Easy enough to open but fur seems to stick to the filter, which seems to get quickly clogged with dirt/dust. I have to wash it out frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: Product review
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the product. Manufacturer should consider adding hardware in order to attach the vacuum to a wall. Also, the manufacturer should consider installing a battery pack ( 2 battery packs) instead of plugging it in every time it needs a charge.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great sweeper, poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: I love the shark, but it only lasts for about a year . Replacing the battery cost almost as much as getting a new one . We have bought three of them now and will not buy another .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: Whatever you want a hand held vac for, this is not it. Suction is minimal, battery lasts for 15 minutes tops, it barely holds any dirt before needing to be emptied and it is a pain to clean. Also, the pet accessory is useless, barely gathers any hair off of our couch. I have had it for a while now and I wish I had just returned it when I first received it. My fault for thinking that somehow it would "get better" just because it is a Shark. I use their uprights and they are wonderful but this is just not up to par with them.
customer_reviews.author: noname

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this because we have 2 cats and furniture. Lol. Our kitties love laying on the back of our couches. I would have to pull out the big vacuum and attach the stair cleaner, every other day. I keep this on charge all the time and it is ready to go. It does a great job for the day to day fur removal. I remove the clumps of hair from the filter and use a small dust pan brush to thoroughly clean it. It has been great so far. I am back to getting the big vacuum out only once a week. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shark Brand Is All I Use Anyway...
customer_reviews.text: I love this because it enables me to do some quick cleaning during the weekdays. For example I can turn it on to pick up animal hair, crumbs on the kitchen floor or dust bunnies in the living room. It takes about 5 minutes and I'm able to save weekly vacuuming for Saturday. Its powerful and very easy to clean. I highly recommend this handheld Shark.
customer_reviews.author: Edythe

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our tent trailer since our little kids and dogs are always dragging stuff in. It works well, nice suction, fits nicely in the small space we have. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Adams

customer_reviews.title: A ittle disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave this product four stars is the short battery life. Very disappointed. The suction is great, easy to use, a little challenging to change attachments, not too noisy, lightweight and easy to clean.....but the battery is a problem. I keep my car clean but there was some dirt and a few crumbs on the passenger side due to my granddaughter eating a cake doughnut. I was only able to clean the two front mats before the battery died.
customer_reviews.author: Arie

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this debris get stuck in it
customer_reviews.text: Great suction Only lasts about 15 min each charge Design flaw i brought it to clean up around my litter box but litter gets trapped in an opening in the nose and cannot be removed.UPDATE UNIT DIED TODAY AFTER ONLY FIVE MONTHS OF LIGHT USE.
customer_reviews.author: lulu centola

customer_reviews.title: AMAMZING LITTLE VAC
customer_reviews.text: I have 15 steps to my upstairs and try to use an upright vac is a pain. This little handheld vac is simply amazing. M6 house has never been cleaner. I have two dog and two cats the pet attachment gets all the hair off of the furniture and steps. I charge the battery over night after it has died. I can tell you the battery at least with mine will last an hour, hour and a half never being shut off. It has excellent suction power. My grout is starting to come up on my tile floors and little pieces of degree get inside those cracks, this little vacuum gets it out. You wont be dissapointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: mom101

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful unless for super light duty stuff
customer_reviews.text: I liked its overall size, the weight/ power distribution was not feasible, as this thing was pretty weak for how heavy it was. Easy to clean but not worth it. I wanted to use for cleaning car floor mats or other little jobs but was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: D V

customer_reviews.title: I really like this sucker
customer_reviews.text: I specifically bought this to clean the carpet on the staircase to my basement and for quick cleanups around the cat food bowl. It’s light and because it is cordless it makes work on the stairs safer without a cord. My 2 cats are very sound sensitive and the quiet motor is an unexpected plus. We guys want more, more, more and that’s why I didn’t give it all the stars on Suction and Battery life however those things are probably sufficient for anything I want to do. I don’t need to vacuum bowling balls. Overall I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Its a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Its a tiny bit heavy and the accessories like the crevice tool and the rotating pet hairr brush are of little use to me but the vacuum works well with good suction and its not overly noisy. The charging light is informative, telling you that its charging or fully charged. Like all these items, the most time you'll ever get is 13 minutes before needing to recharge. The only negative to me is that I wish I could hang it on the wall instead of leaving it on the floor or small table. So to sum up- its a good buy and does what its supposed to do. I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Best rechargeable vacuum - ever!
customer_reviews.text: Strong suction, well made -- I have had several Black & Decker vacuums, this is much better.
customer_reviews.author: N. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Much better than older versions...
customer_reviews.text: I've used various versions of the Shark hand vac for years, and this one is much better than all others before it. It has about the same suction power, but unlike previous versions, this one maintains full suction power for entire battery life, instead of slowly losing power as battery gets low. Still easy to clean and good battery life overall.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ed

customer_reviews.title: Gets MOST Pet Hair
customer_reviews.text: It does a pretty good job, but not perfect. It gets about 90%, which is pretty good. Still requires quite a few passes to get up a lot of the hair. I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Outperforms everything else I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: i have 2 dogs, one cat and a wife who all shed. Except for a few stains, my carpeted stairs, now again, look as good as when installed. I did all 12 stairs and a 4X4 landing on one battery charge. Can't believe the amount of hair and dirt left behind my our other vacuums I did not buy extra filters, but I can see they will be required. There is an aluminum 90 degree bend after the pickup brush and before the collection canister which keeps clogging. A butter knife will easily clean it out, but think of what I am missing when it does clog?? Very happy with the Shark and it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, lasting suction and easy clean. Effortless buy!
customer_reviews.text: My last hand vac died within 2 months. This little thing has a surprising amount of power, the attachments are lifesavers and i always have it nearby. It can clean up pretty much anything, and after a few months of consistent use it has not lost its power one bit. I researched a ton of hand vaccuums after my other one was such a disappointment and I am so glad i settled on this one. It’s also super easy to clean the inside and the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No charging base/holder
customer_reviews.text: I liked the design of the older model with the stand-up charging base better. But the battery on that one died. This one does a good job removing cat hairs, but it has to be charged plugged in & lying flat with no holder. I’m wondering how long this one will last before the battery dies? Bring back the former model!
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Bossom

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I can vacuum the steps and couch off of one charge so no problem with the battery after a few uses. Battery recharges quickly in a couple hours. The suction itself doesn't seem very strong but it still manages to remove a canister full of dog hair. Works exactly for what I bought it for so I'm happy, just wish the suction was a tad stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Robb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - I use it a lot! Great for dog hair.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Had a kitten visit w my daughter for Christmas and we had 2 litter boxes. We have a shedding like crazy Chesapeake retriever. This is so handy - I could clean all day with it. It has done all I needed and the battery never ran down on me. Does my baseboards and really picks up the hair etc. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Debra G.

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks.....in the best way possible!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time i have purchased a hand held vacuum and i must say, I was pleasantly surprised. For something so small and lightweight, it sure does the job. It is a sucking machine. The only thing i wish was a little better would be the battery life, but other than that, its great! I have owned mine for months now and i use it on stairs, my leather sectional, my leather car interior, EVERYTHING. lol well worth the money IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Jbatt88

customer_reviews.title: So convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is great to have around as a quick cleanup tool. I use it on the stairs when I use my robot vacuum so I don't have to lug the whole manual vacuum out. It's also great for furniture (pet fur). The battery doesn't last very long, but as long as you're not trying to vacuum your entire house with it, it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon D.

customer_reviews.title: Great suction and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Unlike previous portable hand vacs I’ve had, this one has great suction. I have two of these on opposite ends of the house and use them to clean up after i’ve worked with my house plants. It does a good job of picking up debris from our car interior too. The brush attachment does the job.
customer_reviews.author: M. Heeren

customer_reviews.title: Shark with a big appetite for dust and pet hair
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I bought this vaccum. It gets all the kitty litter and scratching post shavings and and the sweeper attachment is great getting the pet hair off my bed and sofa. So convenient to use! I use it every day and makes the task of cleaning most better and easier. Less tedious! I find myself looking for dust to vaccum up! The only thing is I have to rinse off the filter each time because it get super dirty and that interferes with the suction
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dolling

customer_reviews.title: Tackled pet hair on carpeted stairs
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box for the first time, I was able to remove pet hair from 8 out of 16 stairs before it gave me the low battery notification. After a few hours of charging, it was ready to go and finished the job well. The canister was fairly easy to empty and the filter cleaned easily as well. Satisfied with the first use and with the charging time.
customer_reviews.author: doxiegrl

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction
customer_reviews.text: This hand vac struggled to pick cat litter up off of hardwood floor, which was the exact reason I bought it. It has been returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I'm SO disappointed in this handvac compared to the purple Shark handvac I had before. The suction is so much weaker & the battery lasts for maybe 1.5 hours of regular use. I deeply wish Id bought the other Shark. So disappointed
customer_reviews.author: KDK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little vacuum for every mom
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum. It picks up all the little messes toddlers make on a regular basis and I would recommend this to everyone. Very easy to dump out and clean. Picks up just about everything. Works on carpet and hardwood floors. Also get in between couch cushions like magic. No more taking out the gigantic vacuum just for a simple mess.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I have own a shark vacumm for about 10 years and I expected same type of product. I bought it to clean kitty litter, but not only the suction is not the best, it's a pain to clean it as you can not completley empty the tank, some pieces do not come out, the filter is very messy to clean and it's very hard to change between the nozzles. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Only holds small amount of dirt, then stops sucking
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to finally find a hand held vacuum with motorized brush that works. Unfortunately this is not the one. Works great for like one couch, then filter gets plugged up, no more suction and you have to stop and clean it all out to start again. Dirt basket is too small and filter gets plugged too easily. Once the filter is plugged up you either have to crank up your air compressor and blow it all out or wash it, but if washed you have to wait for it to dry before using again.
customer_reviews.author: Taqtase

customer_reviews.title: Died after about 15 uses
customer_reviews.text: After about 15 uses, the red light turned on which apparently indicates overheating. I let it sit for 5 days and the red light remained on. I barely used it - It shouldn't have broken this fast. Suction power is sufficient. I don't like how there's not much space inside, so I have to dump it often. Overall would not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Kitkat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on Pet Hair
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 large dogs. Each time I take them in the care, it looks like it has been snowing dog hair. This vac does a great job of picking out the hair. Normally, I have to go through a roll of tape to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Zaxnu

customer_reviews.title: Meh.....
customer_reviews.text: It works okay. Not the best suction and the pet brush doesnt work well. Got this mainly for our stair runners and still have to use our larger vaccuum for the stairs if I want the fur all picked up.
customer_reviews.author: D.S. Lasecki

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to find a hand vac that is really good and this one is the best I have had. Would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: IR

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job With Ease.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with performance thus far. Great suction and does a very good job on pet hair. Battery Life if a lot better than my previous hand vacuum--no need to keep charged when not using for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie K

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the big competitor.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works and is easier to use than the big competitor. Seems that Shark bought the competition and designed out all of the issues. Suction is very good picks up cat and dog hair and easy to clean, battery is to be expected, lasts for a approx 15 minutes does not slow but when the battery is low it shuts off. Competitor has the exhaust pointing towards the operator, Shark point it downwards.
customer_reviews.author: Souper

customer_reviews.title: It works as promoted!
customer_reviews.text: I do like this vacuum. It works great with pet hair. I just wish it had some different attachments. I haven't had any problem with battery life. It is easy to clean. I even got water in it on accident and it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for over a year. Bought as replacement for 8 year old version. Great quality. Really gets up the dirt and dog hair. Easy to clean. Only complaint is that I can’t find replacement filters of same quality as original.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I had low expectations. This is not a shop vac... but it does a very good job for easy cleanups far better than I expected. It works great for weekly car cleanup and only need the shop vac for a deep clean. I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Seatiger

customer_reviews.title: Love this little sharkie!
customer_reviews.text: This is the handiest little vacuum for quick cleanup. I hate vacuuming and this little sharkie has been helpful for removing cat fur and kitty litter trails if I’m having unexpected guests and for cleaning up crumbs in the kitchen. Also works great on car mats and seats. Doesn’t hold much debris so have to clean regularly, though I haven’t tried washing the filter yet.
customer_reviews.author: Anju

customer_reviews.title: No issue. Great power!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had an issue with this purchase at all. This vacuum gets the job done and has great suction power. Simply charge it overnight when you first get it and --- full power. It has not run out of power yet and I've had it for about a month now. No complaints thus far!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recharge
customer_reviews.text: This cordless vacuum is excellent when charged. Does a first rate job of picking up pet hair in carpets. Unfortunately, the chargers are very flimsy at the plug end. The wire broke and another one did the same thing even though we were extra cautious. Now, chargers are "currently unavailable." It doesn't matter how well it works when you can no longer charge it. Giving up and trying another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie D. Thornburg

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is last years model and there is nothing wrong with that and it cleans very well, I looked up this years version and this and almost no change except for price and I went with this version and it works better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M Texidor

customer_reviews.title: A great little sucker!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a really strong handheld vacuum! This guy is light and maneuverable, has good tools that really work, especially the powered carpet brush. The suction is excellent-- better than the pricey Dyson that I had before. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: 415th

customer_reviews.title: Quite possibly my favorite thing I have bought on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Get this! I have a long haired cat, a beagle that loves to shed; so I am covered in hair pretty much at all times! This handheld is AWESOME!! I love it. It works so well. It’s light, it has great suction, and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Getting this Shark made me a hero to my wife
customer_reviews.text: This shark is light and easy to use. It has wonderful ability to pick up debris and the battery life is long enough for extended vacuuming, such as out in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Deloria

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I just got my delivery today! I was so excited I opened it as soon as it was dropped off, and used it! I got it specifically for my stairs, and area rugs! I LOVE it, so far! The suction was great, and my area rugs look debri free! I'm glad I purchased this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Product does not charge or turn on
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. The manufacturer makes you pay for them to ship you a working unit.
customer_reviews.author: Food Guru

customer_reviews.title: Descent Handheld Vaccum.
customer_reviews.text: This vaccum has a strong suction.It works really well on picking up animal hair.I like that it is cordless and portable. I will say the battery life is not the best. The full charge ,last at most, 15 minutes. This, I believe is a problem with most cordless vaccums.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Battery time too short.
customer_reviews.text: it was okay, but for the money and Shark brand I would expect better battery life per charge. Product itself had pretty good suction, although it did blow a lot of air as some reviews also reported. Wish I could still do a return on it, but it’s past the return date :(
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet hair!
customer_reviews.text: Great for anyone with a pet household who needs something to pick up litter around a litter box or pet hair on your couch. Good suction power and holds a charge well. Nice little vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Arleen

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Battery life lasted me 8 stairs doing a full vacuum job on each. Which isn’t bad I suppose, but that’s only half of my stairs. Great suction and the attachments are wonderful to have.
customer_reviews.author: Stormyy

customer_reviews.title: Good, but battery is AWFUL.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to vacuum my car. The suction is quite good, but battery time is ~10 min at best. So, great for quick spot cleaning, but if you need to run for a while, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Biotech Sales Guy

customer_reviews.title: Shark’s the best!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it mainly for quick cleanups and the stairs. The one that I’ve had for several years still works but the brush attachment quit working so we still use it with the straight attachment and the new one on the stairs. I really like Shark products!
customer_reviews.author: sudieb

customer_reviews.title: Animal fur is no match for this machine
customer_reviews.text: The only reason it's four and not five stars is that it doesn't really hold a charge very long. But t has a lot of power, and removed cat fur and dog fur and crumbs from all the little crevices they hide in.
customer_reviews.author: B Olivares

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today. I am a fan of shark. Tried it for litter, car mats and seats. Worked well. It can be used with the min beater bar or as a traditional dust buster type vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Helenm

customer_reviews.title: Very loud
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product for portable vacuum in the car and area which is hard to reach with normal vacuum cleaner. But this thing is LOUD! I can only handle x amount of time to vacuum with it and battery does dies pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Neuheisel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed, better than what I expected! I use this mainly for the carpet stairs and it works just as good as out dyson corded big vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Best suction on a vacuum-
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum!!! Cleans my car wonderfully!! So happy! Great suction! I have a German shepherd who rides with me and this is excellent for when he sheds
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Connor

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I do like this little thing. It's made cleaning much easier. But.. the battery life sucks. I can only get 5-10mins before I have to charge it again. Which is really annoying. And when I go to empty it, dust gets EVERYWHERE. And the little filter thing is very hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Bowers

customer_reviews.title: The product does not vacuum cat hair
customer_reviews.text: I will like a full refund it does not pick up my cat hair the charge holds up for not even 10 minutes how do I get a full refund?
customer_reviews.author: Dulce Rios

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vacuum !  Stop searching  and purchase !
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little vacuum. Does the job, well! Holds a good battery. Cleans carpet steps with the attachment like a boss! I did a ton of research on these and glad I picked this one. Worth every dollar .
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lightweight tool that is even good at cleaning carpeted steps, the car interior, inside kitchen drawers or cabinets, the uses are endless. This was a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Small

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our camper but we also use it for cleaning out the vehicles. It's easy to use and works great! It's not super heavy either.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Riding

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine, but No Base.
customer_reviews.text: Previously had the battery version of this vac. It finally went. Decided to buy the Lithium-ion version. Didn’t realize that this version doesn’t come with a base or the tool with a brush on the end. That was my wifes favorite. And, although the new vac fits on the old base, the tools are not compatible. Damn, my wife is not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Marty R.

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: As a pet parent with a white couch and a dog with black fur, this vacuum has been a blessing. It's powerful and keeps a charge for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has powerful suction!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my stairs (and possibly baseboards, furniture, and/or blinds). I just got it and it is unbelievable how much it picked off of my stairs. I am very happy with it so far. I do not know anything about the battery life or cleaning it yet. I am just impressed with how well it picked up dust/lint from my stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Kerstine I. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Amazing suction power!
customer_reviews.text: OMG I LOVE this thing!! The motorized pet hair attachment is perfect to easily clean my carpeted steps. I'm in a 4-story townhouse, so having a small, lightweight hand vac with great suction power is key. The crevice attachment is superb (think about your car!), and the vac charges quickly. Beats the hand vacs I've ever owned, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum because it is lightweight and had good reviews. We like it for vacuuming cat and dog fur. It’s easy to pick up dirt in corners too.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Mckay

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life is AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Shark Handheld little vacuum! It is very powerful, picks up the littlest pieces of stuff and very good on pet hair too! I was most blown away by the battery life, I've charged it ONE Time since I purchased it back in April! (is now Oct!) Can not go wrong getting this little machine, imo.
customer_reviews.author: Julie H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was moving in to an RV with a dog that sheds a lot. Very tight and confined spaces. I can have the entire camper vacuumed and hair free on one full battery charge. The only thing that would make this perfect was if it came with an extendable handle for hard to reach places for us short people.
customer_reviews.author: Scrotus

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and fairly lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great for our home! We still have our main vacuum for the floors but this lightweight cordless one is perfect couch cushions, carpeted stairs, car interiors between washes or just small messes between cleaning. Keeps charge for a long time so thats nice too
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Good value and operation for price
customer_reviews.text: Works well, battery could last a bit longer (lasts roughly 30 minutes), suction good. Filter catch’s a lot of dust ( which is great!) but only clean with a dry rag or old toothbrush; wet cleaning the filter led to a moldy smell for the rest of the life of the filter. Definitely satisfied with quality for the price paid. Will be buying more Shark products based on experience and general reviews.
customer_reviews.author: shane bowser

customer_reviews.title: Good powerful suction and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Powerful suction. Very good battery life. Would like to have a crevice tool but overall very pleased. It really vacuums well and seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after two months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in October and it completely stopped working the other day. When it did work, suction was not great for hard floors but it worked well on the sofa. Very disappointed as it didn’t even last two months.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Giacomantonio
